name: Pack Up && OUT!
description:
What! Need to move?

Pack up! Pack up! Squeeze everything in the box!

How to play:

Up Arrow --> Change mode, rotating or moving

Down Arrow --> Drop item

Left and Right Arrow --> Rotate or move item left or right

Credits: 

Assests from:

https://creazilla.com/
